title: Here we go baby, my 16th trip to Silver 5 Promos
body:
I've never won a single promo game.  Ever.

I've already lost the first one.  Lets see if we can keep the streak alive

Xx360NorscoutElite is the god of Silver 5

Edit: Didn't play support for once and carried as {{champion:86}} . Went 13/3.  First Promo Victory

Thank you for everyone's support

Time to win that Second one|

Edit 2

http://i.imgur.com/t3QgZ5m.jpg[/img]
